refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Envelope follower unit generator emmulating a Perkin Elmer Vactrole VTL5C3/2.

refsect1.title: Initialisation
refsect1.para: iup -- The rise time of the filter, which defaults to 20,
idown -- The fall time of the filter, which defaults to 3000,

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: asig -- The signal from which to extract the envelope.

refsect1.title: Examples
